amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for DOE energy efficiency and renewable energy activities by $101,550,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriation in the bill for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $101,550,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 320 (Roll no. 509).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 320 (Roll no. 509).
